findings.description: IAM user does not have MFA (multi-factor authentication) enabled
findings.remediation: Enable MFA: AWS Console → IAM → Users → cspm-audit-user → Security credentials → Assign MFA device → Use virtual MFA device (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)

findings.description: No CloudTrail trails configured - API activity logging is disabled
findings.remediation: Enable CloudTrail: AWS Console → CloudTrail → Create trail → Apply trail to all regions → Enable log file validation → Create new S3 bucket for logs
